)

func main() {

		_, err := appsync.NewSourceApiAssociation(ctx, "test", &appsync.SourceApiAssociationArgs{
			Description: pulumi.String("My source API Merged"),
			MergedApiId: pulumi.String("gzos6bteufdunffzzifiowisoe"),
			SourceApiId: pulumi.String("fzzifiowisoegzos6bteufdunf"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

<h4 id="sourceapiassociationtimeouts">
Source<wbr>Api<wbr>Association<wbr>Timeouts<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python,go" class="inline">, Source<wbr>Api<wbr>Association<wbr>Timeouts<wbr>Args</pulumi-choosable>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>

Valid time units are &quot;s&quot; (seconds), &quot;m&quot; (minutes), &quot;h&quot; (hours).         <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A string that can be <a href="https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration">parsed as a duration</a> consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as &quot;30s&quot; or &quot;2h45m&quot;. Valid time units are &quot;s&quot; (seconds), &quot;m&quot; (minutes), &quot;h&quot; (hours). Setting a timeout for a Delete operation is only applicable if changes are saved into state before the destroy operation occurs.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import AppSync Source Api Association using the `gzos6bteufdunffzzifiowisoe,243685a0-9347-4a1a-89c1-9b57dea01e31`. For example:

```sh
$ pulumi import aws:appsync/sourceApiAssociation:SourceApiAssociation example gzos6bteufdunffzzifiowisoe,243685a0-9347-4a1a-89c1-9b57dea01e31
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
